name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_7e96db68-09c9-40fb-8ba9-7a9468e440de
text:
rule Insecure_Or_Clear_Text_Authentication_Detected {
  

  meta:
    
    author = "TCS Cloud MDR COE team"
    description = "Insecure_Or_Clear_Text_Authentication_Detected"
    severity = "High"
    type = "alert"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Credential Access"
    mitre_attack_technique = "Insecure Credentials"

  events:
    
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Windows"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "4624" or $e.metadata.product_event_type = "4776"
    $e.metadata.description = "Logon Type:8"


  outcome:
    
    $risk_score = 50

  condition:
    $e
}
author: TCS Cloud MDR COE team
